Kingdom Hearts II Final Mix+ have 2 discs, I have those discs. First disc is Kingdom Hearts II Final Mix+, second is Kingdom Hearts Re: Chain of Memories (Japanese).

Disc 1 - Kingdom Hearts 2 Final Mix
Disc 2 - Kingdom Hearts Re : Chain Of Memories

I'm running PCSX2 0.9.8, and this game runs spectacular. The FMVS I've seen so far are flawless. The only thing is this game is very Processor heavy to emulate, with my AMD x4 620 I get mild slowdown in certain battles, the worst so far ( I'm only lvl 32ish and at 2nd visit to Olympus ) is the battle with Seifer at the beginning. In fact, Twilight Town lags for me in general. Great game though, I recommend to any KH fans.
P.S. I only Download the first disc ( KH 2 FM+ ) so I can't say anything about KH RE- CoM which is disc 2.
